data.name: AMS-III.F. | BOLD Carbon (CH₄) - SSC
data.description: The BOLD (Breakthrough in Organics Landfill Diversion) Carbon methodology establishes the certification process for confirming avoided methane emissions from aerobic composting of organic waste at small-scale, professional composting facilities and distribution of rewards to supply chain contributors.

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates that each MassID is unique within the system to prevent duplicate entries and double counting
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Waste Mass is Unique

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Verifies that the MassID has not been previously registered in other carbon certificates or carbon credits to prevent double issuance
mass_id_audit_rules.name: No Conflicting GasID or Credit

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Confirms that the MassID processing occurred within the valid project timeframe as defined by methodology guidelines
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Project Period Limit

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Checks if all participating entities have valid certifications and permissions
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Participant Accreditations & Verifications Requirements

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates the proper categorization and definition of the organic waste mass
mass_id_audit_rules.name: MassID Qualifications

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Ensures the waste is properly classified according to Brazilian ABNT NBR 10004 standards and local municipal regulations
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Regional Waste Classification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Verifies the accuracy of geographical coordinates for waste collection and processing locations within 10-meter precision
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Geolocation and Address Precision

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates the documented source and origin point of the organic waste with complete chain of custody documentation
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Waste Origin Identification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Confirms the identity, ANTT registration, and environmental credentials of the waste transportation company
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Hauler Identification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Verifies the registration, inspection certificates, and environmental compliance of vehicles used in waste transportation
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Vehicle Identification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates the identity, CNH (driver's license), and proper licensing of the waste transport driver
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Driver Identification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Checks the completeness and accuracy of MTR (Waste Transport Manifest) documentation and digital signatures
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Transport Manifest Data

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates the identity, environmental licensing, and ISO 14001 certification of the waste processing facility
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Processor Identification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Confirms the identity, CETESB licensing, and operational credentials of the composting facility operator
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Recycler Identification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Verifies the accurate measurement using INMETRO-certified scales and recording of waste MassID quantities with traceability
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Weighing

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates the proper reception, inspection, and documentation of waste material at the composting facility with photographic evidence
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Drop-off at Recycler

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Confirms the proper segregation, contamination analysis, and classification of organic waste materials according to composting requirements
mass_id_audit_rules.name: MassID Sorting

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates that the composting process follows required duration and conditions
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Composting Cycle Timeframe

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Verifies the completion and accuracy of final recycling documentation and outcomes
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Recycling Manifest Data

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validate if the MassID is in accordance with the project boundary, we only output the value
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Project Boundary

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Calculate the prevented CO₂e emissions based on methane emission factors and the processed organic waste mass
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Prevented CO₂e
